title: By the Protector. A proclamation declaring that after the first day of August next no further use be made of any letters of marque, or reprisal, granting unto any private person.
author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
publisher: printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to his Highness,
notes: "Given at White-Hall this 12. day of July 1655."
Arms 48; Steele notation: o- that 2) sun- as.
Reproduction of originals in: British Library; Society of Antiquaries of London Library.
